title: Self Care Resources
cleaned_text: Below are some self care resources for anyone regardless of where they are on their self care journey. Online Resources and Apps [Oak Meditation](https://www.oakmeditation.com/) available in several languages [UCLA Mindfulness Research Center](https://www.uclahealth.org/marc/)- Website for free guided meditations [SuperBetter](https://www.superbetter.com/)- An app with a gaming concept to help increase resilience [Self Care Starter Kit](https://socialwork.buffalo.edu/resources/self-care-starter-kit.html)from the University of Buffalo Other Resources - Self-Help Resources for [Emotional Wellness.](https://uhs.berkeley.edu/counseling/resources) [Getting Help
